comments.body: Your scriptSig pushes the redeemScript with an OP_PUSHDATA1 for a script that is only 71 bytes. For scripts less than or equal to 75 bytes, you don's need to use OP_PUSHDATA opcodes, you can just encode their length directly (with some exceptions for single byte number pushes).Your scriptSig should be:Code:
